title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, and the user tries to create a new table group, the group dialog is not shown.
EB: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set. The user should be able to go and define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try creating a new table group.
